page.title: 17Wormley Against Spurs-WASP
page.content:
Near Wormley JMI, opposite the playing fields, there is a piece of land which Tottenham Hotspur PLC want to develop as their new training ground. Since this is agricultural land permission from the Local Council must be sought. The present plans include four full sized football pitches and various buildings for changing facilities.
Part of the same project is the purchase of the adjoining Wormleybury House, a listed building, for a hotel. At the two recent public meetings to discuss the proposals, the local residents voiced their fears of increased traffic spoiling the character of the village. Broxbourne Council Planning Committee have rejected the proposals and the matter has gone to appeal to the Ministry of the Environment.
